sn22.135:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam mahakotthikam etadavoca:
sn22.135:2.1: “Idhavuso, assutava puthujjano rupam nappajanati, rupasamudayam nappajanati, rupanirodham nappajanati, rupanirodhagaminim patipadam nappajanati.
sn22.135:2.5: vinnanam nappajanati, vinnanasamudayam nappajanati, vinnananirodham nappajanati, vinnananirodhagaminim patipadam nappajanati.
sn22.135:3.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sariputto ayasmantam mahakotthikam etadavoca:
sn22.135:4.1: “Idhavuso, sutava ariyasavako rupam pajanati, rupasamudayam pajanati, rupanirodham pajanati, rupanirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati.
sn22.135:4.5: vinnanam pajanati, vinnanasamudayam pajanati, vinnananirodham pajanati, vinnananirodhagaminim patipadam pajanati.
